document_data.mainbody:
oss Rozzak was a lieutenant of True Soul Minthara Baenre, who served the Absolute within the Shattered Sanctum during the late 15 century DR.
He equipped himself with a goblin-made warboard and a crude scimitar.
In the , Minthara dispatched Rozzak and his scouts to recover a mysterious artifact, which had fallen from a mind flayer nautiloid near the River Chionthar. After Minthara and her fellow True Souls came to believe the artifact was taken to the Emerald Grove, they along with Rozzak began to rally an assault force to take it back from the druids and tieflings within.
